presentation-section.about: Full Stack Developer focused on creating modern and well-structured digital solutions, ensuring code quality, good practices and robust architecture.

about-section.title: About me
about-section.p1: My name is Gustavo Monnerat, I'm a software developer and a postgraduate student in Software Architecture.
about-section.p2: I work as a full-stack freelancer, developing projects with technologies such as Golang, Express.js (Node), React, Angular, Docker and AWS.
about-section.p3: My career has been marked by a constant quest for learning and technical improvement, with the aim of creating efficient and scalable solutions, combining theory and practice.
